src:
Real Madrids supertalent (18) skrev Champions League-historie: Tidenes yngste med hat trick
Real Madrid knuste Galatasaray.
06 Nov 2019, 22:28 by NTB

REAL MADRID - GALATASARAY 6–0

Etter 13 minutter sto det 3-0 til Real Madrid over tafatte Galatasaray i Champions Leagues gruppe A. Til slutt endte det 6-0.
Fire minutter tok det før Real Madrid scoret hjemme på Santiago Bernabeu. Umarkerte Rodrygo var mannen bak scoringen etter en corner. Hans velrettede skudd med venstrebeinet satt helt nede ved stolperoten.
Tre minutter senere satt den igjen til 2-0 for Rodrygo. Denne gangen kom målet etter en heading fra rundt seks meters hold. Marcelos pasning var strålende på det siste målet. Marcelo var også nest sist på ballen på det første målet. Dessverre for Real Madrid måtte Marcelo forlate banen med skade rett før første omgang var over.
18 år gamle Rodrygo har scoret fire mål i Champions League-gruppespillet til nå, og han har totalt seks mål inkludert La Liga-fulltreffere så langt i sesongen. Det er pene tall for brasilianeren.
VAR var involvert da Toni Kroos ble felt innenfor 16-meteren, og 3-0 kom på straffespark i det 14. minutt. Kapteinen Sergio Ramos var stødigheten selv da han iskaldt satte en av sine karakteristiske «Panenka-varianter».

Les ogsåKeeperkaos for Manchester City: Måtte bruke utespiller i mål


FaktaChampions League menn onsdag, gruppespillet 4. runde:


Gruppe A:


Paris Saint-Germain (Frankrike) – Brugge (Belgia) 1-0 (1-0), Real Madrid (Spania) – Galatasaray (Tyrkia) 6-0 (4-0).


Gruppe B:


Bayern München (Tyskland) – Olympiakos (Hellas) 2-0 (1-0), Røde Stjerne (Serbia) – Tottenham (England) 0-4 (0-1).


Gruppe C:


Atalanta (Italia) – Manchester C. (England) 1-1 (0-1), Dinamo Zagreb (Kroatia) – Sjakhtar Donetsk (Ukraina) 3-3 (1-1).


Gruppe D:


Lokomotiv Moskva (Russland) – Juventus (Italia) 1-2 (1-1), Leverkusen (Tyskland) – Atlético Madrid (Spania) 2-1 (1-0).



Sergio Ramos har akkurat scoret på straffe.Bernat Armangue / NTB scanpix.

Nummer to
Casemiro hadde en ball inne noen minutter før pause, men den ble korrekt avblåst for offside. Det ble ikke den neste som satt i kassa til 4-0 på overtid i 1. omgang. Karim Benzema var mannen bak scoringen. Det var hans mål nummer 61 i Champions League og det er fjerde mest av samtlige. Tomålsscorer Rodrygo hadde assist på Benzemas mål.
Benzema har scoret i 15 Champions League-sesonger på rad. Kun Lionel Messi har klar det før ham.
2. omgang ble naturlig nok et lite antiklimaks, men Benzema var ikke ferdigscoret. Ni minutter før full tid satt den andre til 5-0. Det var nummer 62 totalt i Champions League og nummer 50 for Real Madrid. Det er ett mer enn klubblegenden Alfredo Di Stefano i sin tid hadde i serievinnercupen.
På overtid satte Rodrygo sitt tredje mål til 6-0, og han ble den yngste i historien med hat trick i Champions League.
Galatasaray har ikke scoret på sine seks siste bortekamper i Champions League, og Real Madrid-seier betyr at klubben trygget 2.-plassen i gruppa. Etter fire kamper står de med sju poeng.

Les ogsåStjernespiss opp i ryggen på Haaland etter ny scoring



Rodrygo ble den yngste i historien med hat trick i Champions League.SERGIO PEREZ / Reuters

Glemme
Gruppeseieren er det nok bare å glemme siden Paris Saint-Germain er ubeseiret. Franskmennene slo Brugge 1-0 hjemme onsdag og har 12 poeng på fire kamper.
Marco Icardi åpnet showet mot Brugge med scoring etter 22 minutter. Han bredsidet ballen enkelt i mål fra kloss hold etter pasning fra Colin Dagba. Det var hans åttende scoring på ti kamper i Champions League.
Det franske mesterlaget slapp heldig unna da Brugges Mbaye Diagne bommet på straffe i det 77. minutt. Keylor Navas slengte seg riktig vei og reddet som om han aldri skulle ha gjort annet.

Mest lest akkurat nå









Real Madrid CF


Galatasaray


Champions League
text:
Real Madrid's super talent (18) wrote Champions League history: The youngest of the time with a hat trick
Real Madrid crushed Galatasaray.
06 Nov 2019, 22:28 by NTB

REAL MADRID - GALATASARAY 6–0

After 13 minutes, Real Madrid were up 3-0 over defeated Galatasaray in the Champions League group A. Finally, it ended 6-0.
It took four minutes before Real Madrid scored at home to the Santiago Bernabeu. Unmarked Rodrygo was the man behind the score after a corner. His well-aimed shot with his left leg sat at the bottom of the bar.
Three minutes later, it left 2-0 for Rodrygo. This time the goal came after a header from around six meters. Marcelo's pass was brilliant on the final goal. Marcelo was also second to last on the first goal. Unfortunately for Real Madrid, Marcelo had to leave the field with injury just before the first half was over.
18-year-old Rodrygo has scored four goals in the Champions League group game so far, and he has a total of six goals including La Liga full hits so far this season. There are nice numbers for the Brazilian.
VAR was involved when Toni Kroos was fielded within the 16-meter, and 3-0 came on a penalty kick in the 14th minute. Captain Sergio Ramos was the stubbornness even when he iced one of his distinctive "Panenka variants".

Also read Keeperkaos for Manchester City: Had to use outfielder in goal


FactsChampions League Men Wednesday, Group Game Round 4:


Group A:


Paris Saint-Germain (France) - Bruges (Belgium) 1-0 (1-0), Real Madrid (Spain) - Galatasaray (Turkey) 6-0 (4-0).


Group B:


Bayern Munich (Germany) - Olympiakos (Greece) 2-0 (1-0), Red Star (Serbia) - Tottenham (England) 0-4 (0-1).


Group C:


Atalanta (Italy) - Manchester C. (England) 1-1 (0-1), Dinamo Zagreb (Croatia) - Shakhtar Donetsk (Ukraine) 3-3 (1-1).


Group D:


Locomotive Moscow (Russia) - Juventus (Italy) 1-2 (1-1), Leverkusen (Germany) - Atlético Madrid (Spain) 2-1 (1-0).



Sergio Ramos has just scored on penalties.Bernat Armangue / NTB scanpix.

Number two
Casemiro had a ball inside a few minutes before the break, but it was properly blown offside. It was not the next to put the cash at 4-0 overtime in the first half. Karim Benzema was the man behind the score. It was his No. 61 goal in the Champions League and it is the fourth most of all. Two-goal scorer Rodrygo had an assist on Benzema's goal.
Benzema has scored in 15 Champions League seasons in a row. Only Lionel Messi has it ready for him.
The second half was obviously a little anti-climax, but Benzema was not finished. Nine minutes before full time, the other was 5-0. It was number 62 overall in the Champions League and number 50 for Real Madrid. It is one more than club legend Alfredo Di Stefano of his time in the series winner's cup.
In overtime, Rodrygo set his third goal to 6-0, and he became the youngest in history with the hat trick in the Champions League.
Galatasaray has not scored on their last six away games in the Champions League, and Real Madrid's win means the club secured second place in the group. After four games, they stand with seven points.

Also read Star tip in the back at Haaland after a new scoring



Rodrygo became the youngest in history with the hat trick in the Champions League.SERGIO PEREZ / Reuters

Forget
The group victory is only to be forgotten since Paris Saint-Germain is unbeaten. The French beat Brugge 1-0 at home on Wednesday and have 12 points in four games.
Marco Icardi opened the show against Brugge with scoring after 22 minutes. He easily outpaced the ball into the goal from close range following a pass from Colin Dagba. It was his eighth scoring ten games in the Champions League.
The French champions team slipped away when Bruges's Mbaye Diagne missed a penalty 77 minutes into the match. Keylor Navas threw himself the right way and saved as if he never should have done otherwise.
